channel.title: visa on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in visa on Barefoot Rob

item.title: visa applications complete
item.description: 16:06 Wednesday 22 June 2016 JST I went to the Yokohama immigration office to apply for my permanent residency visa. They suggested I also apply for an extension of my spousal visa because it’s only (?) 2.5 months until my current spousal visa expires. So I applied for both.
